name: SmitchSecure
0:
”Alexa, show the front door”
”Alexa, show the living room”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Using the Smitch Secure Skill, you can ask Alexa to view the live feed from your Smitch smart camera via Echo Show, Echo Spot, Fire TV or Fire tablets. This skill supports the following models of the Smitch devices:
- Smitch 360 1080p WiFi Smart Camera (Model SSCAMPT201)
- Smitch Static 1080p WiFi Smart Camera (Model SSCAMCS101)
To get started, make sure that the Smitch cameras are configured to the Smitch Secure app and turned on. 
In the Alexa app, seach for the Smitch Secure skill. Select 'Enable Skill' button to link your Smitch account.
Now try out commands using the name of the Smitch camera. For example:
"Alexa, show the front door camera"
"Alexa, show the living room camera"
"Alexa, stop"
For additional information and resources, contact our support team at support@mysmitch.com
